metadata.title: CVE-2014-125017 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability classified as critical was found in FFmpeg 2.0. Thisvulnerability affects the function rpza_decode_stream. The manipulationleads to memory corruption. The attack can be initiated remotely. The nameof the patch is Fixes Invalid Writes. It is recommended to apply a patch tofix this issue.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was not-affected').
